title: Pixar Films
description: Test your knowledge of Disney Pixar's amazing movies!

questions.question: What was Pixar's first feature film?
questions.explanation: Toy Story (1995) was the first fully computer-animated feature film and launched Pixar's incredible run!

questions.question: In Finding Nemo, Nemo has a lucky fin.
questions.explanation: Nemo was born with a small, deformed right fin that his dad calls his 'lucky fin'!

questions.question: In Monsters, Inc., what powers the city of Monstropolis?
questions.explanation: Monsters scare children to collect their screams as energy, though they later discover laughter is more powerful!

questions.question: What is the name of the superhero family in The Incredibles?
questions.explanation: The Parr family - Bob, Helen, Violet, Dash, and Jack-Jack - are secretly The Incredibles!

questions.question: WALL-E is a robot who falls in love with another robot named EVE.
questions.explanation: WALL-E, a trash-compacting robot, falls in love with EVE, a sleek probe robot sent to Earth!

questions.question: In Up, how does Carl make his house fly?
questions.explanation: 78-year-old Carl ties thousands of colorful balloons to his house to fly to Paradise Falls!

questions.question: In Inside Out, which emotion is in charge of Riley's core memories?
questions.explanation: Joy tries to keep Riley happy and protect her golden core memories, though she learns Sadness is important too!

questions.question: Ratatouille features a rat who dreams of becoming a chef.
questions.explanation: Remy is a rat with a passion for cooking who secretly controls a human chef by pulling his hair!
